name: MCD Partners
description:
MCD Partners (a LIDA company) is a digital and direct agency with offices in New York, Chicago, London and Sydney. We’re a tight-knit group of designers, developers, creators, coders, storytellers and strategists – who share a passion for bringing smart, best-in-class digital experiences to life.
 
We’re proud to work with leading global brands like Discover, Ikea, TIAA and Land Rover, designing and building digital products and services that millions of people use every day.
